item.title: Japanese Trainer
item.description: I took a couple of Japanese modules at university and I happen to like programming. So I decided to help myself out and write a Flash game to help me learn! Written using Adobe Flash and ActionScript 3, this small program will take you through a quiz of Hiragana and Katakana with the parameters you define. If you still have flash installed have a go! There are some more screen shots below otherwise!
